meanings.definition: A person or thing that federates.
meanings.sent1: The federators gathered to discuss the new rules.
meanings.sent2: The team of federators worked together to form a strong alliance.
meanings.sent3: The little federators decided to join forces and build a fort.
meanings.sent4: In the forest of federators, unity was their strength.
meanings.sent5: The colorful federators stood out in the crowd, bringing people together.

meanings.sent1: We invited the federators to the meeting for their input.
meanings.sent2: The federators were all in agreement about the new project.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous federators played a prank on their leader.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with federators, each with a unique perspective.
meanings.sent5: The energetic federators buzzed around, organizing everything efficiently.
